comment.author: 11418107@N02
comment._content: Lawyer known as "the Duke of Essex Street": query.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=F70E11FC385D1A7A9... Among his stunts, he offered a cat or a teddy bear, plus a free wedding ring, to any couple who came to his office to marry: query.nytimes.com/mem/archive-free/pdf?res=F70817FE355417... query.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=FB0B1FF73A5A12738...
